[ Debugging | The ECLiPSe Built-In Predicates | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

get_leash(?Port, ?Leash)

Currently not supported.
Port
Atom or variable.
Leash
Atom or variable.

Description

Unifies Leash with the leashing mode of the port or ports specified by Port. Currently not supported.

Fail Conditions

None

Resatisfiable

Yes.

Exceptions

(5) type error
Port is instantiated, but not to an atom.
(5) type error
Port is instantiated to an atom, but not to one of the valid ports.
(5) type error
Leash is instantiated, but not to an atom.

Examples

See Also

set_leash / 2, get_flag / 3, set_flag / 3
